sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>x_snc_datasilosci.AppGetDependencies</api_name> <caller_access>1</caller_access> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Retrieves information about the app's dependencies to other apps and required versions.</description> <name>AppGetDependencies</name> <script><![CDATA[function AppGetDependencies() { return [ { name: 'DevTools', version: '1.25.0', url: 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-devtools/', website_url: 'https://www.wildgrube.com/servicenow-devtools' } , { name: 'DataSilos', version: '3.0.0', url: 'https://github.com/saschawildgrube/servicenow-datasilos/', website_url: 'https://www.wildgrube.com/servicenow-datasilos' } ]; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-28 15:08:03</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6ac442f61bfef810edf3642aab4bcbcc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AppGetDependencies</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_datasilosci">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="DataSilosCI WORK IN PROGRESS">7a52f9f21bbef810edf3642aab4bcb8e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6ac442f61bfef810edf3642aab4bcbcc</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-28 15:08:04</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
